OrgName: Agero, Inc. and its subsidiaries, including MBSi Corp. (collectively, “Agero”)
activities: Agero, Inc. and its subsidiaries, including MBSi Corp. (collectively, ”Agero”), is a provider of roadside assistance, claims management services and assignment distribution solutions to the automotive, insurance and financial services industries.  The company processes certain personal information about consumers in the European Economic Area (EEA) on behalf of its clients.  Agero processes sensitive information about consumers to the extent necessary or appropriate for compliance with relevant legal or contractual obligations.
personaldata: Personal information about customers is being processed on behalf of clients
recoursemech: European Union and Swiss data protection authorities
